text:
G2 Crowd | Mid/Senior full-stack developers | Onsite: downtown Chicago, IL

We collect and analyze software and service reviews in the interest of bringing transparency to B2B software buying: https://www.g2crowd.com/

Well funded by founders and major investors. Growing rapidly and hiring in most positions: https://blog.g2crowd.com/careers/

Dev team stuff:

  * Small team with mix of jr/mid/senior people
  * Everyone codes in all parts of the applications
  * Lots of pair programming and peer review
  * No QA or ops staff (developers all code, review, deploy)
  * Rails 5 with ES6
  * Heroku hosting
Looking for mid/senior now but will hire junior later once we can properly support.
